name: mathml-fontsettings
title: MathML Font Settings
description: This add-on allows configuring MathML font settings.
author: Frédéric Wang

preferences.name: mathFontFamilyList
preferences.title: mathFontFamilyList_title
preferences.value: Asana Math, Cambria Math, Latin Modern Math, Lucida Bright Math, Minion Math, Neo Euler, STIX Math, TeX Gyre Bonum Math, TeX Gyre Pagella Math, TeX Gyre Schola Math, TeX Gyre Termes Math, XITS Math
